title: Jungle Fish Ubud Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Relax at Jungle Fish Ubud, a jungle pool club with infinity pool, tropical cocktails, and lush views.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the infinity pool and jungle views.
Sip cocktails and relax by the pool.

title: Jungle Fish Ubud Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of jungle poolside lounging, food, and drinks at Jungle Fish Ubud.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy the infinity pool, jungle views, and club facilities.
Relax by the pool, enjoy club amenities, or explore Ubud.
